name: Delete a magic school from Blouge after the Duel
Defeat Suzaku without using any attacking moves
Get kicked out of Dr. Nusakan's office after he says only one sentence
Arrive at the Duel with only 2 encounters fought
Gain the ability to have 8 turns within OverDrive
Capture the mouse in Baccarat without venturing past the first screen of the underground
Defeat EarthDragon without any deflect or counter moves
Spark 2 or more moves in the same fight
Have a palm reading of Hamster, type Star
Turn a monster into a Mariche
Travel to the areas of Sei's Tomb that were intended to have treasures
